item.description:
Meetup location is at the Dunkin Donuts on 1550 West Main Road, Portsmouth, RI 02871.

This is not a knee dragging event. This is a chill, Zen ride to soak up some of the scenic views in Rhode Island, and enjoy the day although we can easily add some twisties to the route if everyone is up for it.

After we get our caffeine fix, we'll head out along the water line passing the Navy Aircraft Carrier in port, and then off towards Scenic Newport.

Heres a quick itinerary:
Military Highway
Scenic Newport
Fort Adams National Park (Fort Adams, Eisenhower house, and ride through the incredible shore line)
Ocean View Drive
Cliff Walk Mansions
Easton's Beach

and then back towards the original meetup location.

I am open to suggestions on a place to stop for lunch. We can do the actual tour at Fort Adams if everyone agrees, or just ride through. Either way is a good time.

Bring a camera, the views will be incredible.
item.name: Scenic Rhode Island - Chill, Zen ride
